item.title: Lab 1: Intro to Data Science
item.description: Due: 9/8/2017 Setting up your computer Install Python3 We recommend installing Anaconda Python Installing git Downloading the lab files Starting Jupyter Notebook Tasks Summary Submitting assignments To submit your assignment, just make sure that your forked repository is up to date. git push ... Options: git push … data1030_handin

item.title: Getting Started
item.description: This will be a guide to help you get started on the group project.
